name: The Rocket
description:
Welcome to the mysterious universe of The Rocket! Whilst small, it will eventually offer a lot of secrets to explore and will have a fully fledged out story with interesting people (or aliens) and satisfying speed. Right now, warp away to your heart's desire. Reach for the stars, but not too far!

How To Play

"D" to turn left

"A" to turn right

"D" + "A" to go forward

Enjoy! :)

ChangeLogs

Update 1:

-fixed stars, black holes and stations not spawning
